description: Adds or updates a permission policy for a Amazon Q Business application, allowing cross-account access for an ISV. This operation creates a new policy statement for the specified Amazon Q Business application. The policy statement defines the IAM actions that the ISV is allowed to perform on the Amazon Q Business application's resources.

Actions.description: The list of Amazon Q Business actions that the ISV is allowed to perform.

ApplicationId.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application.

Principal.description: Provides user and group information used for filtering documents to use for generating Amazon Q Business conversation responses.

StatementId.description: A unique identifier for the policy statement.
